item.title: 高效率Python编程的90个建议Day1
item.description: Preface Here, I will write down my own notes of the book “Effective Python: 90 Specific Ways to Write Better Python, 2nd Edition". If you like, you can buy it or search its pdf on internet. I will try my best to refine the ideas in my article. Hope you will like my words. Now, let’s start! Item 1: Know Which Version of Python You’re Using You can figure out
